TEXT.S: gaga psani ' skura yow na gaga h'ilan te utux, piyux wa mhoyin utux alang ga, siga musa hkani binah na kki'an utux alang naha. te saying mhoyin cyoli' haca ga hala hm'un ryax haca, ini hngu'un laga, mulu ya'ih yow, kyaku gbyan hnu'yil ga si ga hng'un sasan cugan. te tugal hn'ilan Sali, siga mbahing utux Sali, tugan ryax ini htuw tanux musa mtiyow, ini usa mluyak rgyax uy.
